description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to strengthen strategic-level planning, and to improve efficiency in the fiscal and human resource management of Selected Ministries.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Adoption of the Project Operational Manual (POM) | Description :No later than two (2) months after the EffectiveDate, the Recipient shall adopt the POM, in form and substance acceptable to the Association, for the purpose of implementing theProject. | Due Date :24-Jul-2016Amended agreement: By no later than thirty (30) days after the date of this amendment letter, theRecipient shallupdate the Project Operational Manual to incorporate the revised Project results framework

Recruitment of staff for the PFM secretariat in the Ministry of Finance | Description: The Recipient shall recruit, no later thanthree (3) months after the Effective Date, and maintain thereafter: (i) a Project coordinator, (ii) a procurement officer, (iii) afinance officer, and (iv) a monitoring and evaluation expert for the PCU, all with terms of reference, qualifications andexperience acceptable to the Association

title.narrative: New capital investment projects appraised according to PIM manual
Irregular HR and payroll records corrected/removed

baseline.value: Irregular human resource and payroll records not identified

target.value: 90% of irregular HR and payroll records corrected/removed

actual.value: 98% of irregular records corrected or removed from the HRMIS data extract, which was imported into the replacement HRMIS to run thepayroll since October 2021.

title.narrative: Civil servants and civil pensioners with accurate National ID number captured in HRMIS
Core HR business processes automated and operationalized

baseline.value: HRMIS payroll module in use. HRMIS assessment and human resource management business process review not yet carried out.

target.value: Core HR business processes automated and operationalized

actual.value: All core HR business processes have been automated and operationalized in the new HRMIS. The new payroll and core human resourcesmodules are in usage.

title.narrative: Staff on MOET and MOH payroll mapped to an established position in HRMIS

baseline.value: MOET and MOH staff are not mapped to established positions.

target.value: Staff on MOET and MOH payroll mapped to an established position

actual.value: MOET – The exercise to map MOET staff to established positions has been completed. Given that the revised MOET establishment listhas yet to be approved, staff have been mapped to the existing MOET structures. MOH -Staff on the payroll have been mapped to anestablished position

title.narrative: Revised Institutional Plan implemented by the Ministry of Development Planning

actual.value: Strategic Plan is approved and under implementation.

title.narrative: Citizen feedback collected in one pilot sector

target.value: Citizen feedback collected in one pilot sector

actual.value: The citizen feedback management tool was piloted with 2 Ministries (Ministries of Health and Transportation) starting in lateNovember 2020. The results of data collection are being analyzed by OPM and shared with MOH/MOET.

title.narrative: Quarterly time series published consistent with SDDS requirements

target.value: Quarterly GDP current price and volume time series commencing from the start of the annual time series published

actual.value: Quarterly GDP is published on the Bureau of Statistics’ website: http://www.bos.gov.ls/Publications.htm.

title.narrative: Annual report on SOE fiscal impact published on MOF website

baseline.value: No report on SOE fiscal impact developed

target.value: Annual report on SOE fiscal impact published on MOF website regularly

actual.value: Annual SOE report has been published over the last two years, and the 2018/19 annual report is pending approval from PS MOF andshould be published shortly.

title.narrative: Revised establishment lists in MOET complete

baseline.value: No revised establishment list in MOET

target.value: Revised establishment list in MOET complete

actual.value: A MOET Establishment List was completed, but not endorsed by the Ministry.

title.narrative: Improved availability of reliable statistical data to enhance strategic level planning

actual.value: A second household survey was completed using the revised methodology.

title.narrative: Training on new business procedures complete for HR officers

baseline.value: Training not commenced, as new HR business processes are not yet available.

target.value: Training on new business procedures complete for 50 percent of HR Officers

actual.value: Training on the new business processes and the new HRMIS is complete for all HR officers. Over 75% of the officers trained arewomen.
